= Examples =

== First motivational example ==

Consider following *java* source

{{{

private int uk;
private int[] stack;

int synchronized getSize() {
  return uk;
}

void synchronized put(int x) {
  stack[uk++] = x;
}

int synchronized push() {
  return stack[uk--];
}

thread1() {
  for (int i=0; i<10; i++) {
    put(i);
  }
  while (getSize()) > 0) {
    \\ BAD BAD BAD
    push();
  } 
}

thread2() {
  thread1();
}

}}}
